text:
Online violence against women journalists is the new frontline in journalism safety. It's where networked misogyny & digital disinformation intersect.

text:
Dr. Raghavan suggests using the "BDA" technique when taking on a traumatic assignment.

Before: Check in with yourself for signs of stress – it’s ok to say no.

During: Focus on the task at hand. Breathe, take breaks.

After: Find some safety. Regroup and recoup. https://t.co/IKKdtaRGtC

text:
From our webinar with @pressfreedom, a checklist for journos covering protests. Before you go in, have on:
✅ Loose, sturdy, non-flammable clothes
✅ Mask
✅ Eye protection
✅ Head protection
✅ ID (on a lanyard attached to your clothes!)
✅ Reflective vest
✅ Medical kit
